name: Making Do
description:
CONTROLS: 

Movement: Left and right or A and D arrow keys

Jumping: Space or Up arrow Keys

Aim with the mouse cursor and fire your crossbow with left mouse button.

Walk over your fired bolt to pick it up to be fired again.

Back to main menu: Esc Key.

Thank you for taking the time to both read this and play my game! Here's hoping I can use this to work on some other grand projects in the future!

You play as a gnome who must make their way through a series of passages with only one shot in their trusty crossbow.

Shoot or stand on the coloured magic circles to remove the barriers that are blocking your path.
